title: Great place to work!
text: Pros Greatly value the product as well as the people that make Cockroach Labs such an amazing place to work. An additional factor is the founders. All three founders come from a history of contributing to the open source world – two of the founders created the GIMP from their dorm room in 1995. This lends to a culture that is open, transparent, where individuals can self-manage and are held accountable for the work they do. Also, solid work/life balance with dedicated 20% time called Free Fridays. Cons No downsides at this time. Advice to Management Management is doing a great job in ensuring that they are open and transparent with communication. Continue to share and listen to your employees as we grow. It's a component that we all value!
